definition: (usually plural) small personal articles or clothing or sewing items
details:
noun
- (usually plural) small personal articles or clothing or sewing items
= example: (usually plural) small personal articles or clothing or sewing items
- a general inclusive concept
- a vague idea in which some confidence is placed
= synonyms: feeling
- an odd or fanciful or capricious idea
= example: an odd or fanciful or capricious idea
= synonyms: whimsy, whimsey, whim
